topic.title: where is data file in MacOS?
Do you consider supporting Mathjax?
topic.body: If I want to enter the math formula with Latex syntax, I don't seem to be able to do it at the moment. Because you don't support Mathjax, can you consider supporting Mathjax? It's very important for taking mathematical notes

1604065993_mirrored_ellicefix_github.body: IN sierra，this is the only path

1604065998_mirrored_ellicefix_github.body: Thank you. I'm trying. I didn't expect Mathjax's full library file to be so big. Anyway, I'm looking forward to your formal support for Mathjax, which is more friendly to most students or teachers at school.
